channel.title: Need Help With Server Compiler, Please help me
channel.description:
I got TestScape, when i start the compiler, which is named "compile" in TestScape, an error pops out in the command window saying "javac" is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file, Press any key to continue..."
Hope you can help me. Thanks. :)

item.title: Need Help With Server Compiler, Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

No. It was your variables.

You’re welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Server Compiler, Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Yay, another person to help!

Set your environmental variables. Go into tut section, there’s a tut called ‘to stop the questions’ or something like that - should be stickied.

Go to the variable part.

Read full topic
